Very good "take out" Chinese food in Barcelona. Just want we needed after 7 days of tapas. The fried noodles are like American chow mein and the beef with onions was spot on. A touch greasy, hot and full of Chinese flavor. Yum!  We ordered the drunken shrimp and out came a bowl of fully dressed shrimp in a bowl of liquid. No thanks!  4 entrees and 2 beers $25 euros. The restaurant is very plain and casual.
